name: Ambient Americana
description: Ambient music made using traditional Americana and Country instrumentation.

name: Ambient Noise Wall
description: Combines the static approach of Harsh Noise Wall with textures leaning towards Ambient music.

name: Dark Ambient
description: Emphasizes an ominous, gloomy, and dissonant atmosphere.

children.name: Black Ambient
children.description: Incorporates elements such as guitars, synthesizers, harsh or whispered vocals, raw production, or other elements associated with Black Metal and Dungeon Synth.

children.name: Ritual Ambient
children.description: Dark, deep, disturbing, ritualistic, and occult atmosphere.

name: Space Ambient
description: Flowing and relaxing synthesizer-based music derived from Progressive Electronic, often oriented around imagery of outer space.

name: Tribal Ambient
description: Combines the theory and atmosphere of Ambient with traditional instruments and sounds from around the globe.
